title: ADVISORY-India markets closed on Wednesday for holiday
text:
ADVISORY-India markets closed on Wednesday for holiday

Forex 19 minutes ago (Oct 02, 2019 07:40)

© Reuters. ADVISORY-India markets closed on Wednesday for holiday BENGALURU, Oct 2 (Reuters) - India's currency, debt and equity markets are closed on Wednesday, Oct.2, for a public holiday. Financial markets will resume trading on Thursday, Oct. 3. The benchmark BSE index closed down 0.94% at 38,305.41 on Tuesday, while the broader NSE index ended 1% lower at 11,359.90. The 10-year benchmark bond yield IN072629G=CC ended at 6.66%, while the rupee INR=D4 settled at 71.07 to the dollar.

ADVISORY-India markets closed on Wednesday for holiday
